functions.name: review_diff
functions.description: Review a unified diff and select hunks to apply or rework.

number.description: Index of the hunk in the diff. Starts from 1.

reason.description: Reason for applying or ignoring this hunk, or for asking for it to be reworked.

decision.description: Whether to apply this hunk, rework, or ignore it.

hunks.reason: The hunk incorrectly concatenates the MONGODB_URI variable instead of adding a new line for the PORT variable. This mistake would cause the MONGODB_URI to be malformed and the PORT variable to be ignored.

response.review_notes: The developer intended to add a new environment variable for the PORT but mistakenly concatenated it to the MONGODB_URI variable. This needs to be corrected by placing the PORT variable on a new line to ensure both the database connection and server port configuration work as intended.
